text: Pierre-Louis Padang Coffin (born March 15, 1967) is a French animator and director. He is best known for directing Despicable Me (2010) and Despicable Me 2 (2013) as well as the spin-off called Minions released in December 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Coffin's Site Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:French movie directors Category:French voice actors Category:French animators
title: Pierre Coffin
